tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TransportationData (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	route_name VARCHAR(255),
	start_location VARCHAR(255),
	end_location VARCHAR(255),
	distance FLOAT,
	fuel_consumed FLOAT,
	carbon_emissions FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    start_location VARCHAR(50),
    end_location VARCHAR(50),
    distance FLOAT,
    fuel_consumption FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    max_capacity FLOAT,
    fuel_efficiency FLOAT,
    carbon_emission FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE TransportationRoutes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_location VARCHAR(255),
  end_location VARCHAR(255),
  distance FLOAT,
  time_estimate INT
);

CREATE TABLE FuelConsumption (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  fuel_type VARCHAR(50),
  fuel_consumed FLOAT,
  distance_covered FLOAT,
  date DATE
);
CREATE TABLE routes (route_id INT PRIMARY KEY, origin_location STRING, destination_location STRING, distance FLOAT, estimated_time INT)
CREATE TABLE vehicles (vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY, vehicle_type STRING, fuel_type STRING, fuel_capacity FLOAT, fuel_consumption_rate FLOAT)
CREATE TABLE emissions_data (emission_id INT PRIMARY KEY, route_id INT, vehicle_id INT, carbon_emissions FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE optimization_results (result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, route_id INT, fuel_saved FLOAT, carbon_emissions_saved FLOAT, optimization_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_location VARCHAR(255),
  destination_location VARCHAR(255),
  distance FLOAT,
  estimated_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE emissions (
  emission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT REFERENCES routes(route_id),
  vehicle_id INT REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id),
  carbon_emissions FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE optimizations (
  optimization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT REFERENCES routes(route_id),
  vehicle_id INT REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id),
  efficiency_score FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
